text: The Last Man On Earth is a 1964 post-apocalyptic movie. It is based on the 1954 novel I Am Legend. The Last Man on Earth is in the public domain. == References == Category:1964 horror movies Category:1960s science fiction movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Italian science fiction movies Category:Italian horror movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Sidney Salkow Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies about viral outbreaks Category:Movies about solitude
title: The Last Man on Earth (1964 movie)
